thProver

Class Ordering

  • java.lang.Object
    • thProver.Ordering

  • public class Ordering
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements three type of ordering: - lexicographic - multiset - Knuth-Bendix (kbo)
    Author:
    Alessandro Gottoli vr352595

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ordering()
      Construct a new empty ordering to set up with setPrecedence and setWeights

      • Ordering

        public Ordering()
        Construct a new empty ordering to set up with setPrecedence and setWeights

    • Method Detail

      • setUseOrdStandard

        public void setUseOrdStandard(boolean o)
        Set to use the standard ordering implemented if the argument is true. Otherwise use the user defined precedence.
        Parameters:
        o - true for use standart, false for use user defined

      • setPrecedence

        public void setPrecedence(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> prec,
                 int nPrec)
        Set the precedences defined by the user.
        Parameters:
        prec - precedences
        nPrec - number of precedences

                 int wV)
        Set the weight for kbo
        Parameters:
        wF - map of the weights of other symbols
        wV - weight of the variables

      • isMaxLitInClause

                       Clause c)
        Check if the given literal is maximal in clause (never used)
        Parameters:

        c - clause
        Returns:

      • isGreater

        public boolean isGreater(java.lang.Object a,
                java.lang.Object b)
        Procedure to determine if the object a is greater of the object b. The ordering used has to be choose before call this.
        Parameters:
        a - object a
        b - object b
        Returns:
        true if a>b, false othewise
